name: Tumbleweed (itch) (Thia Broido)
description:
Tumbleweed is a two-person, 1v1 first person shooter spotlighting smooth parkour movement and a diverse cast of weapons from which players build their in-game loadouts. The map has a wild west town center surrounded closely by climbable forest! Players only have 2 weapons at once and cannot reload; they receive a new fully loaded weapon from their loadout upon running out of ammo or choosing to switch a current weapon out. They can also pick up other desirable weapons around the map, such as by climbing a tree. The goal? To kill the other player and to explore the map. Be nimble, be creative, have fun!

This game is currently in development. Tumbleweed is being created by Truman Costello and Thia Broido.
